fields.summary: "Atlassian answers" handling user limits

fields.description:
Watch settings aren't represented holistically across different levels (watch all, watch topic, watch question). 

An example: Suppose I have the "Watch all" option selected.
* Why should it appear on a topic page as if I am not watching that topic? 
* Why should I be prompted to watch the question in the email notification I get. If I were to select "Watch this question" in a notification email, how would this alter anything? If anything I should be prompted with an option to *unwatch* the particular question.

This inconsistency creates confusion about what settings are selected and what their effects are.
fields.summary: Watch options presented across tool and email notifications inconsistent with behavior
Not possible to use permanent link to the comment

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47297].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
When using the functionality to ask a question in a Space, the question itself and any answers posted are not listed in the Confluence Question user profile (it does increase the number of answers, points, and accepted if applicable). 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Install Confluence
# Install Confluence Questions 2.0.10
# Create a space in Confluence
# Ask a question in that space
# Add an answer to the question
# Click the username link for the question to go to the user's Questions profile
** Alternatively you could go to <baseurl>/questions/users?username=<username>

h3. Expected Results
Clicking the Questions tab should show a link to the question asked, and clicking Answers should show a link to the answer given.

h3. Actual Results
You will see a message like "No question answered." See:
!question.png|thumbnail!
!answered.png|thumbnail!
 
h3. Notes
This only affects questions asked inside of a space, if a question is asked or answered in the Confluence Questions area it will show as expected.
fields.summary: Questions asked/answered in a space do not appear in 'Questions' and 'Answers' tabs in user Confluence Questions profile

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47295].
  {panel}

Even though the NPS configuration on the production database is configured for a minumum value of 0 and a maximum value of 10, the UI control does not allow a value less than 1 to be entered.  This will create an upward skew in our NPS calculations if we assume that a score of 0 is valid.

Additionally, the default value is 6, which is slightly higher than the true medium score.  The default should be changed to 5 once the UI slider bug is fixed so that the default answer is a true neutral score.

See also:
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/167777/why-is-the-help-us-improve-part-of-this-site-a-10-point-scale?page=1#167784
fields.summary: Default NPS slider configuration is biased

  {panel}

*Summary*
After moving a question with answer from one space to another, the moved question will remain on the popular tab of the old Confluence. If the question does NOT have an associated answer, the question will move and does no longer appear on the old space. 

*Steps to reproduce*
# Create a question in space A.
# Answer the question.
# Move to space B.

*Expected Results*
The question will move completely, with answer, to space B and will  no longer appear on space A.

*Actual Results*
The question will move to space B, but remains on the popular tab on space A. 

*No workaround*

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When selecting syntax formatting in Code Block Macro in Confluence questions, formatting is not used.

h3. Environment
* Confluence 5.9.1-OD-2015.44.1-0002
* Questions for Confluence Plugin 2.4.1-D20151021T063334

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a Confluence Question
# Insert *Code Block* macro, and select a formatting option.
# Compare by inserting the same configuration in Confluence.

h3. Expected Results
Formatting should match that in Confluence and use highlighting for the language selected.

h3. Actual Results
Formatting does not change from when you do not select a language, vs when you do.

Questions:
!Screen Shot 2015-10-27 at 12.25.18.jpg!

Confluence:
!Screen Shot 2015-10-27 at 12.25.32.jpg!

Tested with SQL and Java to be sure, same results.

h3.Workaround
No current workaround.

h3. Notes
The bug affects the following customization options: *Syntax Highlighting*, *Collapsible*, *Show line numbers*, *First line number* and *Theme*. (*Title* does work.)

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Topics are not suggested when asking a question through the Questions List macro. This leads users to create multiple topics if the casing differs. 

h3. Environment
Confluence Server

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Make sure Questions for Confluence and the Questions List macro is installed
# Go to the Questions tab
# Create a couple of test topics
# Go to a test page in Confluence
# Add the Questions List macro and check the 'Include Ask a Question button'
# Save the page
# Click on the Ask a Question button
# Start typing on of the topics made
# The suggestion does not populate

h3. Expected Results
Suggestions for existing topics populate

h3. Actual Results
nothing populates and no errors

h3.Workaround
Manually create topics with the same casing as original topics (not efficient)

fields.description: {panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa} *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47240]. {panel} Multiple CSRF vulnerabilities exist on answers.atlassian.com where an attacker can potentially perform actions such as the following, if the victim visits the attackers malicious resource: Confirmed affected: - Upvoting of answers - Downvoting of answers - Deletion of answers or comments - Liking of comments - Cancelling of bounties - Marking as favourite Unconfirmed however may be possible: - Conversion of answers to comments via crafted form - Setting and confirming a bounty Steps to reproduce: h3. Issuing Arbritrary Likes/Upvotes/Downvotes 1. Find the comment or answer you wish to like/upvote/downvote. 2. To obtain its ID, search the HTML source for "/vote/" or inspect the comment element and find its ID. It should be in this format "/vote/[ID]/up/" 3. Once the ID is obtained simply place it in the following "img" tag accordingly: 4. When placed into a HTML file and visited by the authenticated Atlassian Answers victim, regardless of which domain the HTML is hosted on, the comment will be upvoted. 5. To down vote, change "/up/" to "/down/" accordingly in the src value of the img tag. 6. In order to make the victim like a comment, change the img's src value to "/like_comment/[id]/" accordingly. The following endpoints were identified to be vulnerable: {noformat} /vote/[id]/up/ /vote/[id]/down/ /bounty/[id]/cancel/ /like_comment/[id]/ /mark_favorite/[id]/ /delete_comment/[id]/ /delete/[id]/ {noformat} The following HTTP request was able to successfully delete a comment made by me, without any prior verification or validation: {noformat} GET /delete_comment/299015/ HTTP/1.1 Host: answers.atlassian.com Connection: keep-alive Accept: image/webp,*/*;q=0.8 User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 5_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/534.46 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.1 Mobile/9B176 Safari/7534.48.3 DNT: 1 Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate,sdch Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.8 Cookie: [redacted] {noformat}
fields.summary: Multiple CSRF vulnerabilties in Question/Answer Threads

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47235].
  {panel}

h3. Step to replicate
# Create a question and attach an attachmen to the question.
# Edit the question and move it to another space.
# Edit the question again.

Observed Result:
The following ERROR appear in the browser
{code}
Your Confluence administrator can use the support request form to create a support ticket which will include this information.

We will respond as promptly as possible.
Thank you!

Return to site homepage…
Cause

java.lang.NullPointerException: inputStream cannot be null
at com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull(Preconditions.java:204)
Stack Trace:[hide]

java.lang.NullPointerException: inputStream cannot be null
at com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull(Preconditions.java:204)
at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.persistence.dao.AttachmentDataStream$InputStreamWrapper.<init>(AttachmentDataStream.java:43)
at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.persistence.dao.filesystem.FileSystemAttachmentDataDao.rawBinaryWrapper(FileSystemAttachmentDataDao.java:155)
at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.persistence.dao.filesystem.FileSystemAttachmentDataDao.saveDataForAttachment(FileSystemAttachmentDataDao.java:150)
at 
{code}

The attachment which is stored in the filesystem are not moved to the new location after thhe question is moved to the new space. The attachment still exist in the old location in the filesystem. Because the question in the new space is trying to refer to the attachment in the new location, it could not find the attachment which resulted in the ERROR. 

For example
Before the question was moved to the new space, the attachment is stored in the following location in the filesystem:
{panel}
/home/jing/atlassian/atlassian-confluence-5.6.6/data/attachments/ver003/172/223/59473922/146/60/59310146/59441182
{panel}
After it has been moved it is still in the same location:
{panel}
/home/jing/atlassian/atlassian-confluence-5.6.6/data/attachments/ver003/172/223/59473922/146/60/59310146/59441182
{panel}

By right, the value {{/172/223/59473922}} in the path above should be difference based on the new spaceid as explained here https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Hierarchical+File+System+Attachment+Storage.

fields.summary: Quota Exceeded alert on the Jira Agile Dashboard

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47231].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Unable to attach files to Confluence Questions 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create or go to a Confluence Question
# Insert Link (⌘K) > Files _or_ Insert Image (⌘M)

h3. Expected Results
Able to attach files to a Confluence Question

h3. Actual Results
Getting a {{404 Not Found}} error on request from the network console log
h4. Insert Link (⌘K)
!Screen Shot 2016-02-14 at 10.14.48 PM.png|thumbnail!

h4. Insert Image (⌘M)
!Screen Shot 2016-02-15 at 3.44.02 AM.png|thumbnail!

h3.Workaround
No workaround available
fields.summary: Unable to attach files to Confluence Questions
My Karma points are not being updated for a long time
Notifications for Karma King are triggering every time

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47228].
  {panel}

Hello,

Following a version upgrade on Confluence, I have noticed that all PDF exports do not show our custom base URL in the PDF page links, but instead show "https://confluence/display/...".

It appears that this would be edited under the 'PDF Stylesheet' section of the administration area. However, I'm having a difficult time finding the custom CSS to edit something like this. Can you please let me know if this would be the proper area to edit this and what an example might be to have URLs inside a PDF export to direct the user to a specified custom URL?

-Thank you
fields.summary: PDF Exports Not Showing Custom URL Following Upgrade

{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47224].
  {panel}

h5.Scenario:

* User one: Dave, is a member of {{confluence-administrators}}
* User two: Homer, is not a member of {{confluence-administrators}}
* Both users have created at least one page of content within Confluence, and both can see it - that is, permissions are not a factor in this issue.

h5.Steps to Reproduce:

{code}
Error rendering macro 'content-by-user': null
{code}

{code}

Specifying any other user (even other Confluence administrators) will not cause this error - the macro renders correctly.

The following scenarios were tested:
* When *Dave* creates the macro pointing to *Dave*, the error occurs and the macro does not render correctly.
* When *Dave* creates the macro pointing to *another admin user* the macro renders correctly.
* When *Dave* creates the macro pointing to *Homer*, the macro renders correctly.
* When *Homer* creates the macro pointing to *Homer*, the macro renders correctly.
* When *Homer* creates the macro pointing to *Dave*, the macro renders correctly.

{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47218].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Adding images as logo to a topic does not set the logo
h3. Environment
(Optional - If Applicable)
* Questions for Confluence Plugin 2.4.1-D20151021T063334
* Firefox, Chrome
* Windows, Mac

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a topic
# Add an image as the logo

h3. Expected Results
Image is set as topic logo
h3. Actual Results
Topic logo is not set

h3.Workaround
No workaround at the moment

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47215].
  {panel}

This is an external report, and not a high priority - certainly much lower impact than ANSWERS-648.

This issue was reported by Nakul Mohan <edwardmaya618@gmail.com>, 11 May - the email is too long to reproduce here.

An attacker with the ability to: 
# Inject partial chosen plaintext into a victim's requests
# Measure the size of encrypted traffic
can leverage information leaked by compression to recover targeted parts of the plaintext.

This can be attacked by using the reflected values in /search/ to leak the CSRF token.
fields.summary: Answers is vulnerable to BREACH (SSL/HTTP gzip) attack

fields.description:

  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47214].

Hi ,
I notice many users especially from Atlassian gain high reputation within short time . This is because they are voted up by their colleague / friend . I have identified a few but i dont want to name them .
You can see the leaderboards to identify them .
Is this fair ?
